title: Big Splash
author: ŊOB Universe
abstract: The Big Splash is the foundational concept describing the initial propagation event of pattern energy through the ŊOB universe. It represents the origin moment where obviousness begins to ripple through domains.

theory.core_principle: All pattern manifestation begins with a singular disturbance event—the Big Splash—from which ripples emanate across dimensional and conceptual boundaries.

key_concepts.name: Splash Event
key_concepts.definition: The initial disturbance that triggers pattern propagation

key_concepts.name: Ripple Propagation
key_concepts.definition: The movement of pattern energy outward from the splash point

key_concepts.name: Domain Intersection
key_concepts.definition: Where ripples from different domains meet and create harmonic interference
